title: Add scoring rule
message: Added macro score weighting + updated tests

title: Test pipeline
message: First test: push module + log event to student registry

title: Add roadmap_from_events.py
message: Created roadmap generator using Ollama API (non-interactive) writing to /opt/trading/_student_archive/roadmap/

title: Fix cmd test (tmp + num_predict)
message: Test now writes curl output to tmp file, handles empty/timeout, and limits tokens for speed

title: Improve cmd test output
message: Prompt now requests SORTIE FINALE; fallback prints thinking if response empty; num_predict=64

title: Create module + sanity
message: Created deepseek_thinking module scripts + sanity shortcut

title: Add cmd (thinking-only)
message: Installed cmd-deepseek_thinking run -> writes thinking_YYYYmmdd_HHMMSS.md to /opt/trading/_student_archive/thinking/

title: Create module + sanity
message: Created deepseek_response module scripts + sanity shortcut

title: Add cmd (response-only)
message: Installed cmd-deepseek_response run -> writes response_YYYYmmdd_HHMMSS.md to /opt/trading/_student_archive/response/

title: Install menus package
message: Installed menu/cmd/sanity for deepseek_thinking and deepseek_response from zip

title: Fix archive permissions
message: Chowned /opt/trading/_student_archive/{response,thinking} to student to allow roadmap_module writes

title: Install FAST roadmap_module patch
message: roadmap_module defaults N=40; timeout 300s; num_predict reduced; avoids hangs on CPU

title: Roadmap_module started (bg)
message: Started roadmap_module for desk_pro in background (R1 CPU) to avoid SSH hang; outputs in _student_archive/response|thinking/desk_pro
